resources.string: An Observable emits items to subscribers in hot or cold fashion. Observables subscribes to observables to get notified when an observable emits an item
An Observable emits items to observers by calling observer.onNext(T item). When all items are emitted, the observable can notify the observer by calling observer.onCompleted()
An Observable emits items from a list to subscribers
An Observable emits items to from a list, saving us the need to emit items one by one and calling observer.onNext() and observer.onCompleted() manually
